to walk (side part of split character)

sentences.english: Never far from her work, the mistress of the web patiently waits.
sentences.chinese: 蛛網的女主人永遠守在自己的作品邊，耐心的等候。

sentences.english: It was in a corner that he lay, among weeds and nettles .
sentences.chinese: 它現在是躺在一個生滿了荊棘和荒草的牆角邊。

sentences.english: House of Mountaineers stacks the firewood, neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 山民房子邊堆起的柴薪，整齊而清潔。

sentences.english: Feeling the stones across the river, learning by doing while summing up.
sentences.chinese: “摸著石頭過河，邊幹邊學邊總結”。

sentences.english: Your lips are of be vividly portrayed spring.
sentences.chinese: 你的脣邊是呼之欲出的春天。

sentences.english: The ship lies alongside the wharf.; The steamer lies at the pier.
Students eat huddled around makeshift coal burners for warmth.
sentences.chinese: 學生們圍在煤爐旁邊喫飯邊取暖。

sentences.english: (against) Using a cell phone while driving is against the traffic rules.
sentences.chinese: 邊開車邊打手機是違反交通規則的。

sentences.english: Her house is built near beautiful pool.
sentences.chinese: 她的房子建中一個美麗的池塘邊。

sentences.english: My brother and I took a small washbasin came to the pond.
sentences.chinese: 我和弟弟拿着一個小臉盆來到池塘邊。

sentences.english: Bridges water side, leaving only a broken-hearted song in monopoly Wandering Road.
sentences.chinese: 小橋流水邊，只剩斷腸人在望斷天涯路。

sentences.english: Rippingale chose a beef dish and was eating it while watching an in-flight movie.
sentences.chinese: 裏平格爾選了一份牛肉，邊喫邊看電影。

sentences.english: Rippingale chose a beef dish and was eating it while watching an in-flight movie.

sentences.english: This is when a bone is bent and breaks along only 1 side, like a young stick of wood.
sentences.chinese: 當骨頭彎曲，且就一側邊折斷，如同一根青嫩的枝條。

sentences.chinese: 總之，透熱感應器在使用過程中還必須邊觀察邊檢查。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
